de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.elements

Interface PositionProvider

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PositionProvider
    These providers help automatically determining the next SlotPos a element should be placed in a IMenu based on the previous slot a IElement was added to. When building a default menu element (MButton, ...) the position will be initialized to the provided next slot position, if a PositionProvider was set on the menu, where the previous argument passed to the provider is the position of the the IElement that was last added to the menu using a add() method. Each page on the menu will track their own previous-slot if necessary.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PositionProvider DEFAULT_ROWS
      This is a default PositionProvider that tries to completely fill inventory rows.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PositionProvider Columns(int firstRow, int lastRow)
      This Position Provider returns the SlotPos at the next inventory row or, if lastRow was reached a SlotPos at the next columns firstRow.
      org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.property.SlotPos next(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.property.SlotPos previous) 
      static PositionProvider Rows(int firstColumn, int lastColumn)
      This Position Provider returns the SlotPos at the next inventory column or, if lastColumn was reached a SlotPos at the next rows firstColumn.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_ROWS

        static final PositionProvider DEFAULT_ROWS
        This is a default PositionProvider that tries to completely fill inventory rows. One row is assumed to be 9 slots wide (since most UIs use a chest-like inventory). For more details see PositionProvider.Rows()

    • Method Detail

      • next

        org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.property.SlotPos next(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.property.SlotPos previous)
        Parameters:
        previous - the previous position a element was added to on this page; if no previous element was put on a page this argument will be null

      • Rows

        static PositionProvider Rows(int firstColumn,
                             int lastColumn)
        This Position Provider returns the SlotPos at the next inventory column or, if lastColumn was reached a SlotPos at the next rows firstColumn. The fill order is Left-to-Right; Top-to-Bottom. After the 6th row was filled it will wrap back to the first row.
        Parameters:
        firstColumn - the inclusive first column to reset to, if the row is full
        lastColumn - the exclusive last column, that determines when the row is full
        Returns:
        a PositionProvider that fills rows

      • Columns

        static PositionProvider Columns(int firstRow,
                                int lastRow)
        This Position Provider returns the SlotPos at the next inventory row or, if lastRow was reached a SlotPos at the next columns firstRow. The fill order is Top-to-Bottom; Left-to-Right. After the 9th column was filled it will wrap back to the first column.
        Parameters:
        firstRow - the inclusive first column to reset to, if the row is full
        lastRow - the exclusive last column, that determines when the row is full
        Returns:
        a PositionProvider that fills rows
